title: Off-duty deputy killed in Franklin
content:
(KWBJ) Sheriff Mark Hebert confirmed this morning that Deputy Jason Hagen died as a result of an off-duty incident Thursday night. Hagen had worked as a corrections officer at the parish Corrections Facility in Centerville since February of 2015. He was 24 years old.
Sheriff Hebert said,”it is a sad day. Our law enforcement family is mourning the loss of a young man who was just beginning his career in law enforcement. That bright future is gone. My thoughts and prayers are with Hagen’s family, his friends and our brothers and sisters in blue who served closely alongside him.”
KWBJ was informed last night that the shooting occurred on Curtis St. near Donna Dr. in the Pecan Acres Subdivision in Franklin. We will continue to update this story as more information develops.
This story originally appeared on KWBJ News
